name: my-app
description: My App is a continuously updated personal service collection.
author: jinyaoMa

scripts.design:build: pnpm --filter @jinyaoma/my-app-design exec vue-tsc --noEmit && pnpm --filter @jinyaoma/my-app-design exec vite build
scripts.update:dependencies: pnpm up -r --latest && go get -u && go mod tidy
scripts.install:certs: mkdirp backend/web/static/certs && openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 36524 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout backend/web/static/certs/localhost.key -out backend/web/static/certs/localhost.crt -subj "//SKIP=skip/CN=localhost"
scripts.install:build: go mod tidy && pnpm wails:build && pnpm upx:compress
scripts.install: pnpm install:dist && pnpm install:frontend && pnpm install:certs && pnpm install:docs && pnpm install:build
scripts.preinstall:upx: curl -L https://github.com/upx/upx/releases/download/v3.96/upx-3.96-win64.zip > upx.zip && unzip -p upx.zip '*/upx.exe' > .tools/upx.exe && rm upx.zip
scripts.preinstall: pnpm preinstall:air && pnpm preinstall:wails && pnpm preinstall:swag && pnpm preinstall:upx
